FuncDef: This command specifies the DHCPv6 options to send to the server. There are four options:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the option number and the identification string that will inserted in the DHCP client message to the server. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the hex value of the option. Values-0x0 to 0xFFFFFFFF (maximum 254 hex nibbles).
Specifies the string value of the option. Values-127 character max.
Specifies the domain as in RFC 1035 section 3.1.
